author: jszakmeister
msg: Remove test of $LastChangedBy$ from the export keyword translation test to
avoid failures when no authentication is present.

author: julianfoad
msg: (guarantee_greek_repository): Import the greek tree because that is faster
(pristine_dir): Deleted: it was used only by the dump-load implementation

author: julianfoad
msg: Fix a bug that I stupidly introduced in r7767 after running the the regression
tests.  It looked like a simple optimisation.  Will I ever learn?

author: ehu
msg: Delete file associated with closed-as-resolved issue #1330

author: julianfoad
msg: Use a common library function to walk the working copy for recursive local
propset, propget and proplist, rather than implementing recursion manually.
This does not save much code, but keeps the recursion logic in one place.
For BASE and WC, use svn_wc_walk_entries instead of recursive_prop*.
